list.abs: 中英对照-中国成语篇2|英语沙龙... ... 来讽刺他。 things seldom seem are strange 37. 道貌岸然 look gentlemanly.
British motor racing used to be a gentlemanly affair , just part of the sporting season ., 在英国 , 赛车过去只是一项绅士的消遣 , 是运动时节的一部分.
he was a gentlemanly Georgian , a person of early American probity ( Mary McGrory ) See Synonyms at honesty他是一个绅士型的佐治亚人，一个具备早期美国德行的人(玛丽麦格罗里)参见
being stingy or making some excuse about not paying doesn't seem to be gentlemanly .而且，表示小气或是找借口谢绝买单看起来好像不那么绅士。
I had so utterly fallen from the gentlemanly estate , as to seek acquaintance with the vilest arts of the gambler by profession .我失去了君子风度，大大堕落，竟至打算摸熟职业赌棍那套下流透顶的骗术。

auth_sentence.content: The concept of gentlemanliness matters in business, as elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content: The concept of gentlemanliness matters in business, as elsewhere.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The concept of gentlemanliness matters in business, as elsewhere.

auth_sentence.content: Whatever else you can say, there is a kind of gentlemanliness about him.
auth_sentence.res_content: Whatever else you can say, there is a kind of gentlemanliness about him.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Whatever else you can say, there is a kind of gentlemanliness about him.

auth_sentence.content: In the record business, I find that there is no sense that gentlemanliness matters.
auth_sentence.res_content: In the record business, I find that there is no sense that gentlemanliness matters.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: In the record business, I find that there is no sense that gentlemanliness matters.
